title: soldier-attacking bug with azir
body: there is this strange thing happening when i play azir and place out a soldier. after the soldier has attacked once, azir starts moving towards the target he is attacking, just as if he is trying to go into basic-attack range. i have also noticed that he sometimes just straight up walks backwards instead which is super strange.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is a [known issue](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)! 

Azir has been re-enabled after fixing a few critical issues. We're aware of a lingering bug where Azir can start automatically moving after issuing soldier attack commands. However, because movement is canceled by other inputs and Azir is a high-input champion, we feel it didn't warrant leaving Azir disabled. It'll be fixed next patch!
